thread.section_title: webtropia.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von webtropia.com | www.webtropia.com
thread.title: Lorenzo Pinosa

author: Lorenzo Pinosa
title: Lorenzo Pinosa
text:
I have been a customer of webtropia since 2013, and had two different dedicated root servers.
Their quality/price ratio is really good, they include in the price essential services like KVMoIP that many other companies charge separately, and also their support is quite fast.
The only problems I have had in 4 years are a little server downtime due to some urgent maintenance that has been announced to me only some hours before (I upset about that but they made up for it), and very seldom some misunderstanding with support Due to English.
In conclusion, I would definitely recommend this company to a friend, and indeed I did sometimes.
